heading: Mandolin ensembles.
general-note: Here are entered compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for ten or more solo mandolins and collections of compositions in several forms or types for various numbers of solo mandolins..
Compositions for fewer than ten solo mandolins are entered under. Plucked instrument trios (Mandolins (3)); Plucked instrument quartets (Mandolins (4));. and similar headings..
When used for an accompanying ensemble in headings, the term "mandolin ensemble" stands for two or more solo mandolins..
